content: **crocheted bag with lace pattern and treble_crochet groups in drops bomull-lin or drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no l-158 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements circumference approx 81 cm length without straps 39 cm straps measure approx 45 cm **materials** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250 g colour 05 brown or use drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300 g colour 44 brown **crochet gauge ** 16 treble crochets in width and 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm **crochet hook ** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
